Package ohos.agp.window.service

Class ComponentPadding

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.agp.window.service.ComponentPadding

  • public class ComponentPadding
extends Object
    Describes window padding.

    After a listener is set via Window#setOnApplyComponentPaddingListener, the callback IApplyComponentPaddingListener#notifyPaddingChange(ComponentPadding padding) will be invoked upon padding changes. Applications will use the new padding values passed to the callback for layout.

    Since:
    5

      • useUnchangedPadding

        public ComponentPadding useUnchangedPadding​()
        Clears an unchanged area.

        In an unchanged area, padding values associated with the status bar do not change, regardless of whether the status bar is shown or hidden.

        Returns:
        Returns a new ComponentPadding object with the unchanged area cleared.
        Since:
        5
